title: my account was stolen
body:
heres a short convo with the monron who took it

[9:13] llCABLEll: only get 1 weekend off a month and you destroy it
[9:22] lCABLEl: ur choice
[9:25] llCABLEll: how is you taking my account and blackmailling me my choice
[9:26] lCABLEl: keylog
[9:26] llCABLEll: what
[9:29] lCABLEl: keylog
and u said give u 3 days
[9:29] llCABLEll: i said a few takes time
[9:31] lCABLEl: ok
tell me when u ready
[9:32] llCABLEll: dont even trust u to give it back even if i pay
because of what you do
[9:32] lCABLEl: ok then
bye


ive emailed riot so much they dont even care , ive given all the dam info and nothing no reply for 3 days

replies.body: Friendly reminder bois to confirm your email linked with your account, it makes getting your account back much more likely.
got it back cleaned my pc changed emails ty riot

Normally, u should reinstall windows, keylogger is already in there, change all your information: password, bank credit, everything in your computer. Copy important infomation to USB. Then delete everything in your computer, prevented lost more information by keylogger,
how the hell can someone take your account?
